mosinstall.name: K-Kwadrat Transparent
mosinstall.author: Kamil Wais
mosinstall.copyright: This template is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: A tableless 3 column variable width template with a bottom background image. Now works well with IE and Firefox. Demo on http://www.kamil.rzeszow.pl. Template is based on Rocky Mountain Sunrise template created by Randy Carver (www.carver-family.com)and some JavaScript by hotsnoj.
